txt.en: Collected weapons from the crates near Hen Turrau ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Ox-clan sentries at Hen Turrau ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Hen Turrau is ancient Gondorian tower that was later occupied and built onto by the Dunlending clans inhabiting Carreglyn.

This stack of crates contains war-supplies and provisions for the guards. Alarmingly, they bear not only the mark of the Ox-clan, but of the White Hand as well. Perhaps you should search the rest of the crates around the tower.
Crates can be found around Hen Turrau, east of Barnavon.\n\nYou should search the crates left at Hen Turrau for further evidence of Saruman's interference.

'Alas, that my people, the Uch-l√ªth of Carreglyn, have allied themselves with the Wizard Saruman is not new tidings to me. Indeed, I -- and many others like me -- seek to convince my people that this path is wrong, but we have met with little success.\n\n'Nevertheless, your actions may help to disrupt the White Hand's influence in Barnavon.'
Dunlending guards can be found at Hen Turrau.\n\nYou should defeat the Dunlending guards that have arrived to garrison the watch-tower.
Gwilum is at Barnavon, far to the west of Hen Turrau.\n\nYou should report what you have found to Gwilum.
'Have you found any evidence pointing to the origins of the Warg-riders in Carreglyn?'
Defeat Ox-clan sentries at Hen Turrau ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the weapons to Gwilum in Barnavon
